primary_features: Black TV stand with open shelves

visual_attributes.texture: Smooth surfaces with some glossy finishes

indian_context.regional_style: Not explicitly regional, but could be from any region
indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of vertical space with multi-functional furniture
indian_context.cultural_significance: Decorative symbols represent Hindu spiritual beliefs, adding cultural relevance

ai_generated_tags.description: This image showcases a modern Indian living room with a focus on minimalistic design. The white wardrobe features intricately cut-out religious symbols, including a lotus and Om, symbolizing spirituality. The black TV stand provides a stark contrast with its glossy finish, incorporating both open and closed storage. The overall design is clean and functional, emphasizing contemporary aesthetics with traditional Indian design elements.

metadata.budget_indicator: Moderate, with the use of MDF for the wardrobe and glossy paint for the TV stand
metadata.indian_specific: Use of religious symbols and minimalistic design elements
